thread.title: ODU drops 5th straight in field hockey
thread.title_full: ODU drops 5th straight in field hockey | HamptonRoads.com | PilotOnline.com

author: The Virginian-Pilot
title: ODU drops 5th straight in field hockey
text:
NEWARK, Del. Megan Byas' goal off a penalty corner with 2:16 to play was No. 12 Old Dominion's only score Sunday in a 2-1 non-conference field hockey loss to No. 15 Delaware.
ODU led 9-8 in shots and 6-5 in penalty corners.
The Lady Monarchs (8-8), who've lost five in a row, host Providence at 3 p.m. Friday in their final Big East regular-season game of the season.
